pageContent: Background and purpose: To study a four-point combined analysis (Quadrella) of optimal outcome among patients treated with exclusive permanent seed prostate brachytherapy (PB), as defined by the likelihood of achieving disease control and preserving normal urinary, gastro-intestinal (GI) and sexual function.

metaData.source:
[Sexual problems in patients with prostate cancer and those with benign prostatic hypertrophy]
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/21542379/
